quotes:
You are the light of my world,
In your voice I find peace,
In your smile I find my happiness,
Your innocent kindness makes my day full,
Through every call, your melodic voice makes me melt,
It breaks my heart whenever I say goodbye,
The first and last light I will ever need.

In a world where many happen to carry the same name, you are the one that stands alone and shines brighter than any of themтЬи.
That is why I called you StarLightЁЯМЯ because you are more than others, You are the first and last light I would ever needЁЯТб.
Many may share the name Karthika, but NO ONE could be so close to my heartтЭдя╕П than you.
You are not my friend but so much more - unique, irreplaceable, and endlessтЩ╛я╕П.
Every moment I spend with you feels like a treasureЁЯТО, and my feelings and focus for you only grow strongerЁЯТЦ.
I could search the entire galaxyЁЯММ and never find another like you.
You are not just the brightest star in my skyЁЯМа - you are the only star in my universeЁЯМН,
No matter where life takes us, You are my first and last lightЁЯТл, you are making other stars fadeтЬи.
You are the last person I speak to before sleepЁЯШ┤, and the first one I search for after I wake upЁЯМЕ.

In my point of view L is completely different,
It's the same as how others see it,
Nammaluku pidicha ellame love than,
Athu oru person, memory, connection,
Athu kooda than athiga time spend pannuvom,
Time spend panrathuku enna venalum pannuvom,
Avangaluku pidicha ellame pannuvom,
Ena namakku athu pidikum,
Ethuvume pesama Ellam puriyum,
Namma enna sonnalum kepaanga,
That's love,
And its just appearance and looks nala varathu illa,
Avanga character, kindness, caring, voice, presence, ethula konja konja pidika aramikum,
Itha yaralayum stop panna mudiyaathu,
Its the fundamental concept of the universe.

Today felt like a dream come trueЁЯШК,
Singing songs together ЁЯО╡, talking for hoursЁЯдЩ,
Traveling through the night ЁЯМГ,
Talking, singing, and holding hands, everything went perfectlyтЬи,
I really hope one day that moment will come trueЁЯе▓,
I really want to hold someone's hands ЁЯдЭ
That's you ЁЯл╡, you know that ЁЯШБ
Even it was a dream, I felt so nice when you said that тШ║я╕П,
And I want to experience it soon ЁЯФЬ.

My focus for you is like a laser ЁЯФж,
Clear and steady, it will always focus on you ЁЯОп,
NO one can come close to you ЁЯФЭ,
And there is no need for ANYONE else ЁЯШБ,
And this thought will never changeтЬЛ,
You are the first thought in my mind when I wake upЁЯМД,
And the last one before I fall asleep ЁЯМЙ,
With every call with you and songs we sing togetherЁЯОд,
Feelings for you grow stronger ЁЯУИ.
